about_the_game:
This is a realistic simulation physics universe shooting game, where all enemies are realistically shattered according to mechanics. The game features ray tracing and deeply optimized performance.

Battery layout: You need to purchase various types of batteries and place them in the spacecraft. Reasonably utilize the strengths of combat spacecraft.

Special tower layout: You need to arrange various functional towers purchased or obtained on the spacecraft, such as special units for generating protective covers, space radars for detecting distant enemies, etc.

Special Weapon Use: Right clicking with the mouse will activate the special weapon. There are dozens of special weapons obtained from maps and hoarded, or produced by planetary bases. For example, nuclear warheads and cluster bombs.

Accessories and Enhancements: The game offers hundreds of devices and parts that can strengthen turrets, spaceships, and special weapons. The game requires constant selection and can only be temporarily strengthened. Outside of the game, it will be permanently strengthened.

Planet building: You will conquer countless planets and build military bases, research laboratories, mining bases, oil exploration wells, farmland, and more on mineral rich planets. Games have certain elements of management and cultivation.

Continuously explore various scenes, encounter powerful bosses, aliens, and peculiar enemies, and fight against them. Collect various rare minerals and plants. Spaceships often shuttle through various narrow scenes, as well as in super large scenes such as planetary accretion disks, with a wide variety of types and endless possibilities.

The game emphasizes advanced gaming skills and strategies. There are countless types of spacecraft, fighter jets, turrets, special towers, parts, components, and special weapons in the game, each with its own significance.

The game supports all languages, and most languages such as English and Chinese have very good and appropriate translations

Battery layout: You need to purchase various types of batteries and place them in the spacecraft. Reasonably utilize the strengths of combat spacecraft.

Special tower layout: You need to arrange various functional towers purchased or obtained on the spacecraft, such as special units for generating protective covers, space radars for detecting distant enemies, etc.

Accessories and Enhancements: The game offers hundreds of devices and parts that can strengthen turrets, spaceships, and special weapons. The game requires constant selection and can only be temporarily strengthened. Outside of the game, it will be permanently strengthened.

Planet building: You will conquer countless planets and build military bases, research laboratories, mining bases, oil exploration wells, farmland, and more on mineral rich planets. Games have certain elements of management and cultivation.

Continuously explore various scenes, encounter powerful bosses, aliens, and peculiar enemies, and fight against them. Collect various rare minerals and plants. name: Astrostrike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10/11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Graphics: RTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10/11
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Graphics: RTX 2060

short_description: You are the captain of the Galactic battleship, building hundreds of gun turrets, raising dozens of space fighters, establishing aircraft carrier groups, space stations, and conquering the entire Milky Way
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Japanese*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Korean*, Uzbek*, Urdu*, Armenian*, Igbo*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Croatian*, Icelandic*, Cherokee*, Galician*, Catalan*, Afrikaans*, Kannada*, Luxembourgish*, Hindi*, Gujarati*, Kyrgyz*, Kazakh*, Turkmen*, K'iche'*, Kinyarwanda*, Tajik*, Serbian*, Odia*, Welsh*, Konkani*, Bangla*, Nepali*, Basque*, Hebrew*, Latvian*, Tigrinya*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Swahili*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Georgian*, Maori*, Wolof*, Bosnian*, Persian*, Telugu*, Tamil*, Irish*, Estonian*, Valencian*, Belarusian*, Quechua*, Zulu*, Xhosa*, Lithuanian*, Sotho*, Sorani*, Yoruba*, Uyghur*, Scots*, Tswana*, Filipino*, Mongolian*, Hausa*, Dari*, Azerbaijani*, Amharic*, Albanian*, Assamese*, Tatar*, Macedonian*, Marathi*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Khmer*
*languages with full audio support
